```{r setup}
library(QCAcluster)
library(knitr) # nicer html tables
```

```{r}
# load data (see data description for details)
data(Schwarz2016)
Schwarz_div <- diversity(Schwarz2016, 
                         units = "country", time = "year", 
                         cond = c("poltrans", "ecotrans", "reform", "conflict", "attention"), 
                         out = "enlarge", 1, 0.8)
kable(Schwarz_div)
```
